author: parithosh
content:
**Testing call summary:**
**Pectra**
**pectra-devnet-4**
Prysm is still debugging the deposit issues on devnet-4, we will update the images and restart nodes to see if the issue is recoverable
Mekong has had a round of updates, network is stable and live
devnet-5 spec discussion as well as open PRs, aim is to have all the PRs in this doc closed by ACD this week so that spec releases can happen shortly after: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/pectra-devnet-5

**Peerdas and EOF**
Once devnet-5 spec is out, we will pin these releases for EOF/PeerDAS codebases to rebase on top of
